name: New Skull
description:
Pitch

A puzzle game about skulls trying to be awaken

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Left click to click on interactable blocks
  • Z to undo
  • R to restart a level
  • Spacebar to pass turn
  • N to skip a level
Credits

Made by @TheZampapan and @FranVadilloSB

Note* We didn't have much time to design levels, so there might be big difficulty spikes. Since we have a lot of ideas, we will try to update the game adding more levels to smooth the difficulty.
